statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Your task are to write a program that imitates a simple desk calculator. Your calculator must be able to accept an infix expression which at least includes (, ), +, -, *, /,% . If the expression is legal, output its value, else ouput an error message.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are several test cases, each occupies one line that contains an infix expression. Proceed until the end of the file.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, in one line the value of that expression ( accurate up to two decimal places), or an error message “ERROR IN INFIX NOTATION”.

statement.title: Sample Output
statement.content:
18.39
0.00
ERROR IN INFIX NOTATION
ERROR IN INFIX NOTATION
ERROR IN INFIX NOTATION
ERROR IN INFIX NOTATION
